page.title: 18A School Fete at Boughton
page.content: On Saturday 29th June,1985,it was Boughton School Fete.People worked hard in the morning to get things ready.My mum helped on the Toy Stall. Lots of people came.There was lots of shouting,laughing,music,bells ringing, money clicking and people talking. There were majorettes and gymnastic displays.All sorts os things go on. Games to play,thing to buy and rides to go on.It was a lovely sunny day, clear and bright(that's very unusual for a fete).There was a play area, teas,drinks,and ice-creams to buy. I enjoyed it thoroughly.This year for the first time we started the fete with a three mile Fun Run around the village.Afterwards I helped my mum to pack up.Then I went home happy and tired.We made nearly Â£600 which will go towards buying things the school needs,including a computer disc drive.
